alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 3:04PM MDT until May 25 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Central Denver County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 304 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Centennial, or 10 miles south of Denver, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Denver, southwestern Aurora, Centennial, southwestern Commerce City, eastern Englewood, Greenwood Village and Buckley SFB. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Accumulating hail may contribute to flooding and make roads slippery.
